--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras waited Mirmidon's arrival

After a few moments of flight, Myrmidon's farsighted
optics was able to pick out the form of Hydras. With a
spin and flip Mymidon assumes his massive robot form
as he drops to the ground several meters away from
Hydras. 

Myrmidon stands head and shoulders taller than your
average Predacon warrior and broader through the
shoulder and hip. Predominantly black and purple his
gait and stauture are agressive and yet controlled as
he moves towards Hydras' position. 

He has twin motar cannons, one over each shoulder, his
left arm ends in what appears to be jaws of a shark,
which serves as a cannon mount as well. Large
bird-like wings extend from his back, folding behind
him like some regal cloak. His head appears to a large
jungle cat's, jaws opened wide as if in perpetual
roar. Inside the jaws Myrmidon's face can be made out,
much of it shrowded in shadow, the cat's fangs
protrude down slightly over Myrmidon's forehead.  

Myrmidon's powerful gaze sweeps the area before
locking on Hydras as he comes to stand in front of
him. Placing a clenched fist in front of his chest, he
bows his head to Hydras. "My liege." he intones in a
deep reverberous voice. 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
